source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a serene and majestic aerial view of a mountain range enveloped in thick, white clouds and fog. The camera glides slowly forward, revealing the vast, ethereal landscape. In the foreground, the lush green slopes of a mountain are partially visible, while in the distance, the dark peaks of other mountains pierce through the sea of clouds under an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a serene and majestic aerial view of a mountain range enveloped in thick, white clouds and fog. The camera glides slowly forward, revealing the vast, ethereal landscape. In the foreground, the lush green slopes of a mountain are partially visible, while in the distance, the dark peaks of other mountains pierce through the sea of clouds under an overcast sky.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding coastal road, weaving between palm trees as ocean waves crash nearby. The camera pans steadily to follow their movement, capturing the riders as they accelerate around sharp bends. In the background, sailboats drift across the water under a clear blue sky.
